channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD unveils 5th Gen Epyc embedded processors for networking, storage and industrial edge
item.description: AMD announced the expansion of its x86 embedded processor portfolio with the introduction of 5th Gen AMD Epyc Embedded processors.

item.title: PSYONIC to give live demo of its bionic technology at Robotics Summit
item.description: PSYONIC offers the Ability Hand, which has integrated sensors that detect pressure when the user grips an object. The post PSYONIC to give live demo o...

item.title: GenLayer offers novel approach for AI agent transactions: getting multiple LLMs to vote on a suitable contract
item.description: GenLayer is betting that AI-driven contracts, enforced on the blockchain, will be the foundation for a trillion-dollar marketplace.

item.title: Americans are using this strategy to save money on home insurance. Is it a good idea?
item.description: Homeowners frustrated with rising homeowners-insurance premiums are switching plans and opting for higher deductibles to manage their costs.

item.title: Cerebras just announced 6 new AI datacenters that process 40M tokens per second — and it could be bad news for Nvidia

item.title: Kohl’s stock tumbles on weak outlook as sales slide. Retailer is taking action, CEO says.
item.description: Kohl’s CEO Ashley Buchanan says that the company has “identified key areas of focus.”

item.title: Bearish market alarms are flashing. Citi’s latest downgrade may add fuel to the fire
item.description: Like other Wall Street banks, Citigroup is worried about the state of the U.S. economy, and recommend putting money elsewhere. For now.

item.title: CRM provider Creatio launches first ‘AI native’ platform with agentic digital talent built-in
item.description: The company unveiled a new CRM paradigm that puts a prompt entry box front-and-center, allowing the user to simply type in what they need.

item.title: Altera launches Agilex 3 FPGAs for the intelligent edge
item.description: Altera is launching its latest family of Agilex FPGA chips to help developers expand the boundaries of the intelligent edge.

item.title: Verizon and AT&T are seeing stock drops. Here’s what’s driving the selloff.
item.description: Verizon calls out a more competitive wireless industry, and that’s weighing on its shares — as well as those of its peers.
